main.name: Camin McCluskey
main.description: Currently working at [Skyscanner](https://skyscanner.net) and co-founder of [inHouse](https://inhouseapp.io)
main.bioHeadline: I'm a Software Engineer, currently working on identity infrastructure at [Skyscanner](https://skyscanner.net) in London. I am also the co-founder of an app for housemates - [inHouse](https://inhouseapp.io). Try it now for [iOS](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/inhouse/id1488409238?l=nb) and [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.inhouseapp.inhouse&hl=en_GB)!
main.bioBody: I graduated with First Class Honours in Management from the London School of Economics including a full scholarship year abroad at the University of California, Berkeley to study Computer Science and Machine Learning. I'm interested in Start-ups and Venture Capital, within in the technology sector. I have a particular interest in SaaS businesses leveraging Artificial Intelligence insights.

work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Assisted the research of Professor Catherine Thomas, examining the impact of multinational M&A activity in the Belgian market on international trade flows. Also assisted Professor Thomas and Dr Andrew Bernard (Dartmouth College) with research regarding Foreign Direct Investment into Eastern Europe.
